title: The Alternate
description: Previous cover edition for ASIN B078M73LLCFor alternate cover edition see hereSunny has survived her first encounter with Hellix, but there’s more to come.  The evil organisation is now stalking other talented teenagers. Sunny wants to beat them to the punch in order to flush out Nesti, the shadowy head of Hellix.  To complicate matters, her crush on Hunter hasn’t eased off, in fact, it’s getting worse. Lots worse.  And he’s just taken on a job that puts him closer to Sunny every day – but further away from her arms. The constant temptation will drive her mad – if Nesti doesn’t manage to send her insane first.
author: Lauretta Hignett
